title: Sautéed Mushrooms
instructions: Stir together the lemon juice, soy sauce, and the sugar.  Heat a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until very hot.  Add the olive oil; in it sauté the mushrooms, stirring, until golden brown, about 5 minutes.  Add the butter and garlic and sauté, stirring, until the butter is absorbed.  Add the lemon mixture to the mushrooms, stirring until the sauce is absorbed.
